                     double z)
        Uses inputs to drive relative to robot
        Parameters:
        x - - The sideways input
        y - - The forward/backward input
        z - - The rotational input

      • correctionDrive

        public void correctionDrive(double side,
                            double forward,
                            double reqAng)
        Uses inputs to drive in field oriented mode and also holds angle at reqAng
        Parameters:
        side - - The sideways input
        forward - - The forward/backward input
        reqAng - - The angle the robot should hold at
